Like it or not, Facebook's trademark "Like" button is set to get more expressive.
The social network has announced plans...
...to launch a new set of emoticons to replace the traditional button.
...to express a range of emotions including love, happiness, anger, and sadness.
However, dislike will not be one of them.
It comes after CEO Mark Zuckerberg said the company was working on...
...adding a button other than "Like" to express empathy.
